Mandate: Provide insurance cover across public and private entities while identifying insurance fraud and suspicious underwriting behaviors.
TopPriorities: Protect public infrastructure against theft that could be linked to fraudulent invoices.
Work with regulators to vet claims from high-risk mining suppliers.
Share suspicious claims data with ZRA and ACC.
ActiveOperations: Risk underwriting unit that flags mining clients with unexplained asset transfers.
Claims intelligence sharing with the Zambia Information and Communications Authority (ZICTA) for telecom partners.
Reinsurance collaboration with African Re to trace unusual payout patterns.

RecentActions.Title: Suspended a series of haulage claims tied to a single supplier
RecentActions.Summary: Detailed claim files triggered a joint ACC-ZRA review of the supplier network.

RecentActions.Title: Published new anti-fraud framework for transport and logistics clients
RecentActions.Summary: Framework references global best practices and local regulatory obligations.
